title: Pixel 1 stuck in boot loop.
content:
My old Google Pixel 1 is stuck in an infinite boot loop. Neither recovery mode or the bootloader work; the phone goes right back to the white Google loading screen. I know this is an old phone, but I wanted to get a few more months of use out of it and it seems that no one has a solution to the problem. My question:

Which iPhone should I get to replace it?
